title: Kali is bugged?
body:
I just had a ranked game, and kalista from enemy team was doing so much bad first 5 min till he got occult.
after kali got his occult he 2 auto hits vayne then Insta kill with E. 
I know this may sound weird or possible. BUT Vayne was on 70% HP after 2 auto hits, then Kali E exploded vayne.
That happend not only to vayne it happend to Xinzhao,lulu( me ) and vayne.
Then Kali decided to stop using the bugged Skill, simply because she got fed enough to kill everyone.

Is this coincidence ? or someone abusing the game. 
If its OK to tell his In game name im more happy to tell

replies.body: You sure she wasn't getting rend stacks up on something else then spearing to transfer rend stacks to them?
nope it was clear 2 stack rend which killed our vayne

Is vayne taking any creep damage ? Kalista W deals 12% maximum health magic damage at level 1 and rend deals 20+60% AD. 
Lets do some math: 
Assuming one auto from support to proc kalista passive: 51 dmg
Percent health damage: 72 (assuming vayne health is 600)
2 autos from kalista: 70*2 = 140
Rend: 2* 20 + (120% ad) = 133.6
Total = 396.6 dmg (ignoring armor and Magic resist)
